name: Thunder at the Gates of Hell [5e L5R, Diablo Hack]
name_original: Thunder at the Gates of Hell [5e L5R, Diablo Hack]
description: Work in Progress, currently writing up some roll tables to include. Then deciding if I want to make this into a two-pager to include some "Challenge, Focus, Strike" type seeds for Location Goals. For now, this is likely enough for me to start play testing and for you to try running the game yourself. Happy demon hunting!
